turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to place an order at the Starbucks in 1201 Barbara Jordan Boulevard, Austin, Texas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a tall iced juniper latte with coconut milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while i place that order for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a tall iced juniper latte with coconut milk to be picked up at the starbucks on barbara jordan boulevard, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
